name: STUDIO
description: A high-performance orchestration layer built to give "Industrial Clarity" and engineering precision to AI-assisted development.

name: HandoffKit
description: AI-powered project handoff documentation for consulting agencies and freelancers. Connect your repo, generate comprehensive docs, and ship with confidence.

name: CMS Analyzers Marketplace
description: Claude Code plugins that analyze enterprise CMS codebases, deliver actionable reports with severity ratings, and generate custom AI enhancements.

name: APL - Autonomous Phased Looper
description: Claude Code plugin that transforms Claude into an autonomous coding agent with Plan → Execute → Review cycles and self-learning capabilities.

name: ORC
description: Multi-agent orchestration system for autonomous software development. Coordinates multiple AI agents to tackle complex engineering tasks.

name: Conduit
description: Enterprise MCP server that provides unified access to any CMS through a single, consistent interface.

name: Plugin Architect
description: Expert architect for designing and building Claude Code plugins. Covers the full extension ecosystem — plugins, skills, MCP servers, hooks, agents, and more.

name: Plugin Ops
description: Maintenance and operations engine for Claude Code plugins — health scanning, dependency management, versioning, issue tracking, and runbooks.

name: Plugin GTM
description: Go-to-market engine for Claude Code. Analyze your product, build a GTM strategy, generate launch content, and track your launch — all from the terminal.
